sourceMeaningMnemonic: That <radical>scarecrow</radical> with the <radical>knife</radical> is the <kanji>vice</kanji> president. Yeah, I know how he looks, and I'm pretty sure he does some murdering on the <kanji>side</kanji>, but you didn't hear that from me.
meaningInfo: I don't know how we managed to get a knife-wielding scarecrow as a vice president, there's a side of politics I don't get, I guess. I mean, just look at him up there. If something happens to our president we're stuck with that thing.
readingMnemonic: It's the <kanji>vice</kanji> president's turn to speak at the podium and he just clears his throat and yells, "<reading>F**k</reading> (<ja>ふく</ja>) you!" to the crowd, holding up his knife. They cheer.
readingInfo: What's going on? Normally if a vice president yells f**k you there would be... I dunno... consequences? What's happening?!
